list.name: REGULATE
list.description: Ollie jumps and does a rad kickflip, hypnotizing all enemies where he lands for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Ollie jumps and does a rad kickflip, hypnotizing all enemies where he lands for x seconds.

list.name: ALL-EYEZ-ON-ME
list.description: Ollie's next attack will hypnotize any enemies hit for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Ollie's next attack will hypnotize any enemies hit for x seconds.
